DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to document the natural history of hemophilia. A disease and long-term outcomes in terms of effectiveness, safety and quality of life (QoL) in participants receiving ADVATE in routine clinical practice. Participants may use any treatment regimen, including on-demand and prophylaxis using standardized regimens or individual pharmacokinetic (PK)-guided dosing regimens, or immune tolerance induction (ITI) therapy, as determined by the treating physician.
